name: Dragonhearts
description:
A hack of Mobile Frame Zero: Firebrands by Vincent and Meguey Baker about the romance adventures of shapeshifters who can assume human or dragon form or anything in between. Features include:

You get to be a dragon

You get to kiss dragons

Are you still reading this instead of getting it already!? Okay, you also get to Enter The Ancestral Metadream, perform a Ritual At The Sky Mountain, customize your magical blood, have tense dragon duels At Each Other's Throats—which may at any moment become liaisons In Each Other's Arms—and change the entire world by Attaining Totality during Endgame: The Eclipse. 

This entry was submitted with 1 minute and 19 seconds left to go in the #DREAMJAM, thank you all for dreaming this #DRAGONDREAM with me!

—Alex
